headline: Salesforce and Adobe Start 2026 With a 5% Plunge—Should Investors Buy or Bail?
summary: It was a nasty year for the software stocks in 2025, as investors pondered the disruptive impact of artificial intelligence (AI). With shares of enterprise software and AI agent innovator Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) and creative software titan Adobe (NASDAQ:ADBE) starting off the very first trading day of the year with a steep decline, it feels like ... Salesforce and Adobe Start 2026 With a 5% Plunge—Should Investors Buy or Bail?

headline: 3 Reasons ADBE is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Adobe’s shares (currently trading at $332.39) have posted a disappointing 11.8% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 10.1% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
